lines.text: Maybe he's a Stop Wizard? Check if he's got those tattoos.
You want me to take off that corpse's clothes and check his back for tattoos?
I'm not doin' that. That'd be violatin' protocol. If you're so curious, why don't you take a closer look at the body?
Oh, I already did that. He's got tattoos, but they're not Stop tattoos.
So... you were just tryin' to make me undress a corpse, then.
God, tell me. Why in the whole wide world did you stick me with this kid?
